definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: attend to, visit, muster, appoint (NH id., visit, enjoin; Ph. [[פקד]] attend to, provide; As. paḳâdu = BH; Ar. faqada lose, miss; also (Dozy) give heed, attention, to; Eth. faqada: visit, muster, desire, need, etc.; Nab. [[פקד]] command (Cook), so Targum [[פְּקַד]] Pa., Syr. pqad, also visit);—

definitions.title: A. 1. a.
definitions.body: pay attention to, observe (with care, practical interest), of ´[[י]] c. acc. pers. + rei Ex 3:16 (J), c. acc. pers. Ex 4:31 (J; ‖[[רָאָה]]), Ps 8:5 (with providence, cf. [[פְּקֻדָּה]] Job 10:12; ‖[[זׇכַר]]); c. acc. rei 1Sa 15:2, Ps 80:15 (‖[[הִבִּיט]], [[רָאָה]]), La 4:22 (‖[[גִּלָּה עַל]]), [[יִוְכּׂר עֲוֹנׇם וְיִפְקׂד חַטאׁתָם]] Ho 8:13 = Ho 9:9 = Je 14:10; 1Sa 17:18 observe thy brothers as to well-being ([[לְשָׁלוֹם]]; i.e. see how they fare).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: attend to, in act, see to, c. acc. pers. 2Ki 9:34; acc. of sheep Je 23:2 (in fig.); cf. Zec 10:3 b, Zec 11:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: seek (with interest, desire), seek ´[[י]] Is 26:16; in bad sense, look about for Ez Eze 23:21. Hence

definitions.title: B.
definitions.body: appoint:

c. acc. pers. + [[אִתָּם]] Ge 40:4, + [[עַל]] pers. over whom Je 15:3, Je 51:27, Nu 27:16, + [[אֶל]] (for [[עַל]]) Je 49:19 = Je 50:44; c. acc. pers. alone Nu 3:10, + [[בְּראׁשׁ הָעָם]] De 20:9; pt. pass. pl. appointed ones, officers, of (fighting) host Nu 31:14; Nu 31:48, 2Ki 11:15, 2Ch 23:14.

c. acc. rei, appoint, assign, + [[עַל]] pers. to whom, Nu 4:27 (on text v. Di); c. acc. rei only, v:Nu 4:32; cf. Job 34:13, Job 36:23; lay upon ([[עַל]] pers.) as a charge, Zep 3:7 (rdg. [[מֵעֵינֶיהָ]], LXX We Now, for [[מְעוֹנׇהּ]]); + inf. 2Ch 36:23 = Ezr 1:2; = deposit, c. acc. rei + [[ב]] loc., 2Ki 5:24 (cf. [[פִּקָּדוֹן]]). †

be appointed Ne 7:1, + [[עַל]] Ne 12:44. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: (intens.) muster a host, Pt. [[מְפַקֵּד]] Is 13:4 (of ´[[י]]). †

definitions.title: Pu.

definitions.body: be mustered, Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְפָּֽקְדוּ]] Ju Jdg 20:15, Jdg 20:17; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּתְפָּקֵד]] Jdg 21:9; 3 mpl. Jdg 20:15 (on form v. Ges:§ 541). †
